org.whispersystems.libsignal.protocol

Class SignalMessage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.whispersystems.libsignal.protocol.SignalMessage
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CiphertextMessage

    public class SignalMessage
extends java.lang.Object
implements CiphertextMessage
    Define a signal ciphertext message class between two parties. the message can be encrypted into a Signal message and be decrypted in SessionCipher.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface org.whispersystems.libsignal.protocol.CiphertextMessage
